thread.title: Sunny and nice today with highs around 40, eye on possible weekend stormstorm
thread.title_full: Sunny and nice today with highs around 40, eye on possible weekend stormstorm

author: Matt Hammer
title: Sunny and nice today with highs around 40, eye on possible weekend stormstorm
text: News 12 Storm Watch Team Meteorologist Matt Hammer says it will be nice today with sunshine and highs around 40 degrees. NOW : A COLD, but dry start to the day. The afternoon will be quite nice with sunshine and highs around 40 degrees. NEXT : Another dry day tomorrow before some flurries on Thursday. There is the chance for snow and/or mix on Sunday. FORECAST : TODAY: After a cold start to the day, it will be mostly sunny and nice into the afternoon with highs around 40 degrees. TONIGHT: Mostly clear and cold with lows near 30 degrees. WEDNESDAY: Sun and passing clouds. Nice with highs around 43 degrees. Lows around 30 degrees. THURSDAY: Mostly cloudy with scattered flurries likely. Highs around 41 degrees. Lows around 22 degrees. FRIDAY: Mostly sunny and chilly with highs around 36 degrees. Lows near 25 degrees. SATURDAY: Becoming cloudy with late day snow/mix/rain showers possible. Highs around 38 degrees. Lows near 29 degrees. SUNDAY: MONITORING A NEARBY STORM â€“ This is NOT a guarantee just yet , but there is the chance for a winter storm late Saturday into Sunday that could bring accumulating snow depending on the storm track. There is still LOW confidence in this as of this morning due to fluctuating storm track and intensity. A higher confidence forecast will begin to develop tomorrow. Highs around 35 degrees. Lows around 26 degrees. MONDAY: Sun and clouds. Flurries possible. Highs around 40 degrees. Lows near 29 degrees.

organizations.name: news 12 storm watch team meteorologist matt hammer
